sentences.sentence: Your hippocampal informational inbox of memory email is now cleared out.
sentences.translation: 海马记忆邮件的信息收件箱(在打盹后)已经被清空了。

sentences.sentence: Serious hippocampal damage means the loss of the ability to form new long-term memories.
sentences.translation: 严重的海马体损伤会导致长期记忆能力的遗失。

sentences.sentence: But our new findings highlight the important hippocampal links to behavioural control.
sentences.translation: 但是，新的研究结果着重强调了海马体与行为控制的链接。
